plot outline: Darode means Heist- a simple story of an ambitious youth, Naveen dreaming of entering the tinsel world. He comes to Gandhinagar with the script of Darode and a hope in his eyes to watch his dream come true. There he meets two other talented guys Shivu and Deepu, one is a notorious thief and the other is a beggar whose skills compliment the script of Darode. They all have a big dream but empty wallets in common. It is after much difficulty that they are able to find a producer for their film. To their bad luck this excitement is short lived as the producer enters into a coma the very next day.
title: Darode
plot: _Darode_ (qv) means Heist- a simple story of an ambitious youth, Naveen dreaming of entering the tinsel world. He comes to Gandhinagar with the script of _Darode_ (qv) and a hope in his eyes to watch his dream come true. There he meets two other talented guys Shivu and Deepu, one is a notorious thief and the other is a beggar whose skills compliment the script of _Darode_ (qv). They all have a big dream but empty wallets in common. It is after much difficulty that they are able to find a producer for their film. To their bad luck this excitement is short lived as the producer enters into a coma the very next day.
